From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Lady Hawk looked at the blaster, then followed the arm down to the body. She
then followed the body down to the feat and back up to look him in the eyes.
"I hope you know what you're doing, This just proves the point about the
barbarism in the war." Quickly Lady Hawk dropped to one knee and threw a leg
sweep at Gotron.

She transformed to her half hawk form and readied herself for a battle.
Gotron had an energy weapon and she had her abilities, she almost fealt
sorry that the only action these bots knew was to resort to violence to
solve thier problems.
----- Original Message -----
From: SOULSTICE <thecode@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, December 20, 2000 12:16 PM
Subject: Re: Lady Hawk again.


> Gotron: Oh yeah?
>
> Gotron draws a blaster.
>
> Gotron: Thanks for helping me prove your point, now close your eyws, as
long
> as you don't struggle this won't hurt a bit.
>

we
